name: Webpack
description: Setup and bundling using the Webapck system.

items.name: Webpack Setup
items.description: If you're interested in getting setup with Webpack to build projects, this article will take you through setting up both your machine and a production quality starter project.

items.name: Webpack Bundling
items.description: Before deploying your app to production, you'll want to bundle the assets for efficient use of the network.
